SEARCH
Package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service

Class JataRepository

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service.JataRepository
public class JataRepository extends Object
Links the ViewModel and the JataServiceProxy that talks to the server. Its methods are invoked by the view model, then they invoke code that sends the relevant Json packet to the server.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    JataRepository.InvalidShipPlacementException
    Defines custom exception thrown by changePlacement(List, int) when a user moves or rotates their ship into an invalid position.

    void
    changePlacement(List<Ship> ships, int boardIndex)
    Check the validity or placement of a ship, and updates the List of Ship objects if the placement is valid or throws an exception and reverts the List of Ship to its last valid formation.
    void
    changePlacement(List<Ship> ships, int boardIndex, Ship ship)
    Checks the validity of the placement of the move or rotation of a ship, and rotates the ship 90 degrees if the move or rotation and invokes changePlacement(List, int) to validate again if the rotation would not end in a valid move.

    Validates the placement of ships when a user moves a ship on their board before submitting their ships.

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame(Game game)
      Authenticates a user, invokes the JataServiceProxy.startGame(Game, String) to send an HTTP request to the server, and then begins listening for the long poll responses from the server, and then processes the response from the server.
      Parameters:
      game - A Game object to be sent to the server.

    • submitShips

      public void submitShips(List<Ship> ships)
      Authenticates a user, invokes the JataServiceProxy.submitShips(String, List, String) method to send an HTTP request to the server, and then listens for the long poll responses from the server, and then processes the response from the server.
      Parameters:
      ships - List of Ship objects that will be sent to the server.

    • submitShots

      public void submitShots(List<Shot> shots)
      Authenticates a user, invokes JataServiceProxy.submitShots(String, List, String) to send an HTTP request to the server, listens for the long poll responses from the server, and then processes the response from the server.
      Parameters:
      shots - List of Shot object(s) that is being sent to the server.

    • pollGameStatus

      public Observable<Game> pollGameStatus()
      Processes the long poll responses from the server holding a Game object.
      Returns:
      Reactive stream of the Game object that can be subscribed to.

    • pollThrowable

      public Observable<Throwable> pollThrowable()
      Processes long poll responses throwing an exception.
      Returns:
      Reactive stream of a Throwable that can be subscribed to.

    • stopPolling

      public void stopPolling()
      Stops long polling when invoked.

    • changePlacement

      public void changePlacement(List<Ship> ships, int boardIndex)
      Check the validity or placement of a ship, and updates the List of Ship objects if the placement is valid or throws an exception and reverts the List of Ship to its last valid formation.
      Parameters:
      ships - @link List} of Ship that was last validated successfully.
      boardIndex - The board position in every Game object's List of Board

    • changePlacement

      public void changePlacement(List<Ship> ships, int boardIndex, Ship ship)
      Checks the validity of the placement of the move or rotation of a ship, and rotates the ship 90 degrees if the move or rotation and invokes changePlacement(List, int) to validate again if the rotation would not end in a valid move.
      Parameters:
      ships - List of Ship that was last validated successfully.
      boardIndex - The board position in every Game object's List of Board
      ship - The Ship object that was moved or rotated by the user.

    • isPlacementValid

      public boolean isPlacementValid(List<Ship> ships)
      Validates the placement of ships when a user moves a ship on their board before submitting their ships.
      Parameters:
      ships - List of ships as they have been currently placed on the board.
      Returns:
      Boolean flag indicating whether ship placement is valid.
